word:
How much is comprehended in Christ's prayer for His disciples, as recorded in the seventeenth chapter of John! In this prayer is expressed His mind toward His Father and toward His disciples. This prayer is a lesson to all who are trying to follow the Saviour.--Ms 222, 1902, pp. 1, 2. (Diary, August 2, 1902.) 

Released March 17, 1978.
